alert.note: Alert for Copiah; Simpson (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 19 at 4:39AM CDT until June 19 at 5:30AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Simpson County in central Mississippi... Northeastern Copiah County in central Mississippi... * Until 530 AM CDT. * At 439 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Martinville to near Hopewell, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Mendenhall around 445 AM CDT. Martinville around 450 AM CDT. Sanatorium and Harrisville around 500 AM CDT. Georgetown around 510 AM CDT. Magee and Union around 515 AM CDT. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 AM CDT for central Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
